# Tech Learning Tracker

A simple, local-first web app to track your tech learning progress and save interesting news articles.

## Features
- Track learning topics with progress
- Save tech news and articles
- Weekly progress statistics
- Streak tracking
- 100% local storage (no backend needed)
- Export/Import data as JSON
- Completely free and open source

## Quick Start
Just open `index.html` in your browser!

No installation, no configuration, no dependencies.

## Tech Stack
- HTML5
- CSS3 (Modern design with gradients)
- Vanilla JavaScript
- localStorage API

All data is stored locally in your browser.
